query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS worker_performance (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  userId VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  farmId INT NOT NULL,
  tasksAssigned INT DEFAULT 0,
  tasksCompleted INT DEFAULT 0,
  tasksOverdue INT DEFAULT 0,
  averageCompletionTime INT DEFAULT 0,
  activityScore DECIMAL(5, 2) DEFAULT 0,
  lastActivityAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
  totalHoursWorked DECIMAL(8, 2) DEFAULT 0,
  attendanceRate DECIMAL(5, 2) DEFAULT 0,
  qualityScore DECIMAL(5, 2) DEFAULT 0,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (farmId) REFERENCES farms(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  UNIQUE KEY unique_user_farm (userId, farmId),
  INDEX idx_userId (userId),
  INDEX idx_farmId (farmId),
  INDEX idx_activityScore (activityScore)
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2kNF22PapS9mysw.root --database WZQk4bD8DnsRHwYBkmh7FN --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS worker_performance (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  userId VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  farmId INT NOT NULL,
  tasksAssigned INT DEFAULT 0,
  tasksCompleted INT DEFAULT 0,
  tasksOverdue INT DEFAULT 0,
  averageCompletionTime INT DEFAULT 0,
  activityScore DECIMAL(5, 2) DEFAULT 0,
  lastActivityAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
  totalHoursWorked DECIMAL(8, 2) DEFAULT 0,
  attendanceRate DECIMAL(5, 2) DEFAULT 0,
  qualityScore DECIMAL(5, 2) DEFAULT 0,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (farmId) REFERENCES farms(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  UNIQUE KEY unique_user_farm (userId, farmId),
  INDEX idx_userId (userId),
  INDEX idx_farmId (farmId),
  INDEX idx_activityScore (activityScore)
);
